name: Throw Down The Gauntlet (Kronikle)
description:
The gauntlet has been thrown down.  Battle against the worthiest knights in the land in head to head battles.  Build up your combo meter, collect loot, and cut down your opponents.

Instructions can be found in game by pressing the ? button in the top middle of the combat screen.

Created in 1 week for the Wanna x Yam Game Jam 2022.
